item.description:
It's cold and grey out. But that doesn't mean we can't have fun outdoors.

Frog pond is in the middle of boston common, and easily accessible by the T from anywhere.
let's meet around 4pm at Finagle-A-Bagel (front of the Park St. T Station) and once we have most of people, we can walk over to the frog pond.

Layer well and bring gloves :)
Hope to see you there

http://www.bostoncomm...

*I'm sorry, but I have to change the date.
It's now December 6th, on Sunday. Please update your RSVP accordingly :D *
item.how_to_find_us: look for Sun (will send out my phone number to the RSVP)
item.name: Ice skating fun *changed date to Dec 6th sunday*
